name: Wood Block Match
description:
With a drag, move wooden blocks.
Make a horizontal or vertical line to remove blocks.

[Features]
- Player friendly UI and easy control system.
- Supportive items that help players: Block shuffle, cross removal, bomb items
- Tons of stages provide various entertaining expe rience.
- Classic mode supported: challenge the highest scores!
- Multiplayer game: enjoy the game with other players
- 16 languages supported
- Leaderboard & achievement supported
- Tablet devices supported.
